1）load与add的数据冒险指令
addi r3,r3,6    addi #r3<-r3+6			0110
addi r5,r5,8    addi #r5<-r5+8			1000
store r5,r3(6)  store #Memory[r3+6]<-r5		1100
addi r2,r2,4    addi #r2<-r2+4  r2=4		0100
load r1,r2(8)   load #r1<-Memory[r2+8]		1100
add r2,r1,r2    add  #r2<-r1+r2			1100

b00000000_00000000_00000000_00000000
b000101_00000000_00000110_00011_00011
b000101_00000000_00001000_00101_00101
b001110_00000000_00000110_00011_00101
b000101_00000000_00000100_00010_00010
b001101_00000000_00001000_00010_00001
b000000_000001_00000_00010_00001_00010

2）and与store的数据冒险指令
addi r3,r3,6     addi #r3<-r3+6
addi r2,r2,4     addi #r2<-r2+4
and r1,r2,r3     add #r1<-r2+r3
//将上面两条指令换一下位置再测一次
store r1,r2(12)  store #Memory[r2+12]<-r1

b00000000_00000000_00000000_00000000
b000101_00000000_00000110_00011_00011
b000101_00000000_00000100_00010_00010
b000001_000001_00000_00001_00010_00011
b001110_00000000_00001100_00010_00001

3）算术类指令的数据冒险指令

3-1) add与and的数据冒险指令
addi r1,r1,4   addi #r1<-r1+4
addi r2,r2,8   addi #r2<-r2+4
add r3,r2,r1   add #r3<-r2+r1
and r2,r3,r1   and #r2<-r3+r1

b00000000_00000000_00000000_00000000
b000101_00000000_00000100_00001_00001
b000101_00000000_00001000_00010_00010
b000000_000001_00000_00011_00010_00001
b000001_000001_00000_00010_00011_00001

3-2) add与or的数据冒险指令
addi r1,r1,4   addi #r1<-r1+4
addi r2,r2,8   addi #r2<-r2+4
add r3,r2,r1   add #r3<-r2+r1
or r2,r3,r1    or r2<-r3+r1

b00000000_00000000_00000000_00000000
b000101_00000000_00000100_00001_00001
b000101_00000000_00001000_00010_00010
b000000_000001_00000_00011_00010_00001
b000001_000010_00000_00010_00011_00001

3-3) and与xor的数据冒险指令
addi r1,r1,4   addi #r1<-r1+4
addi r2,r2,8   addi #r2<-r2+4
add r3,r2,r1   add #r3<-r2+r1
xor r2,r3,r1   xor #r2<-r3+r1

b00000000_00000000_00000000_00000000
b000101_00000000_00000100_00001_00001
b000101_00000000_00001000_00010_00010
b000000_000001_00000_00011_00010_00001
b000001_000100_00000_00010_00011_00001

3-4) add,and与or的数据冒险指令
addi r1,r1,4   addi #r1<-r1+4
addi r2,r2,8   addi #r2<-r2+4
add r3,r2,r1   add #r3<-r2+r1
and r4,r3,r2   and #r4<-r3+r2
or r5,r4,r2    or #r5<-r4+r2

b00000000_00000000_00000000_00000000
b000101_00000000_00000100_00001_00001
b000101_00000000_00001000_00010_00010
b000000_000001_00000_00011_00010_00001
b000001_000001_00000_00100_00011_00010
b000001_000010_00000_00101_00100_00010

3-4）add,and,or与xor的数据冒险指令
addi r1,r1,4   addi #r1<-r1+4
addi r2,r2,8   addi #r2<-r2+4
add r3,r2,r1   add #r3<-r2+r1
and r4,r3,r2   and #r4<-r3+r2
or r5,r4,r2    or #r5<-r4+r2
xor r6,r1,r4   xor #r6<-r1+r4

b00000000_00000000_00000000_00000000
b000101_00000000_00000100_00001_00001
b000101_00000000_00001000_00010_00010
b000000_000001_00000_00011_00010_00001
b000001_000001_00000_00100_00011_00010
b000001_000010_00000_00101_00100_00010
b000001_000100_00000_00110_00001_00100
